data.news_title: 'Skip to Loafer' Announces Supporting Cast, Spring 2023 Premiere
data.news_description: The official website for the television anime adaptation of Misaki Takamutsu's Skip to Loafer (Skip and Loafer) manga revealed on Monday three supporting cast members and a key visual (pictured). The anime is scheduled to premiere in April 2023. Cast...
data.author: DatRandomDude

data.news_title: Mobile Game 'Blue Archive' Gets TV Anime
data.news_description: The 2nd Anniversary event of the Blue Archive mobile game announced a television anime adaptation on Sunday, revealing a teaser visual (pictured). Blue Archive is a mobile tactical role-playing game developed by Nexon Games and was released in Japan...
data.author: Hyperion_PS

data.news_description: The official website of the NieR:Automata Ver1.1a television anime series announced on Saturday that the broadcast of episode 4 and onward will be postponed until further notice due to the impact of COVID-19 on the production. The series will rebroad...

data.news_title: TROYCA, Kadokawa Announce 'Overtake!' Original TV Anime
data.news_description: Publisher Kadokawa and animation studio TROYCA announced on Friday an original television anime titled Overtake! and revealed the main cast, staff, teaser visual, and a teaser promotional video. Anan Furuya (Mahoutsukai Reimeiki) and Katsuyuki Konish...
data.author: DatRandomDude
